Each regional version of ''FIFA 11'' features different players on the cover. [[KakÃ¡]] will be featured on the cover globally.<ref>http://kotaku.com/5605780/kaka-is-fifa-11s-worldwide-cover-athlete</ref> The [[United Kingdom]] and [[Republic of Ireland|Ireland]] covers feature KakÃ¡ and [[Wayne Rooney]]; the [[Australia]]n cover features KakÃ¡, Wayne Rooney, and [[Tim Cahill]];<ref>http://www.kotaku.com.au/2010/08/fifa-11-box-art-puts-tim-cahill-at-centre-forward/</ref> and the [[North America]]n version features KakÃ¡, [[Carlos Vela]], and [[Landon Donovan]].<ref>http://www.crunchgear.com/2010/08/12/american-hero-landon-donovan-on-north-american-cover-of-fifa-11-along-with-kaka-carlos-vela/</ref> The Italian cover features [[Giorgio Chiellini]] and KakÃ¡.
